[\[2b.1\]]de'i rjes la gnas der phyag dar dang skyong nul bya zhing /_a ka ru nag pos kyang phyogs bcur bdugs la sa gzhi tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dris byugs te/_de'i dbus su maN+Dal khru gang pa gsum bya ste/_sa de la rin po che bdar zhing 'thas par byas la/_rdo rgyus kyis dkar por bya zhing 'o ma dang tsan+dan dang

[\[2b.5\]]sogs pa/_/rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la/_/lus dang ngag yid gus ldan nas/_/kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang /_/'jig rten dag pa mchog gyur pa/_/rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs/_/kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi/_/bdag gis sngon chad

[\[3a.1\]]'khor ba gnas par du/_/bdag gi dge ba de bzhin du/_/kun nas zad par ma gyur par/_/sems can yongs su smin par shog_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs

[\[3a.5\]]las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/mchod pa'i las rnams bya ba dang /_/sdom pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa/_/shin tu dam pa bdag gis gzung /_/de ltar sdom pa ma lus pa/_/dam pa bdag gis gzung bgyis nas/_/byang chub mchog sems bskyed bgyis nas/_/sems can ma rig ldongs pa rnams/_/bdag

[\[3b.1\]]can don du bsgrub lags kyis/_/byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/_/de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje dang dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi rjes su dran nas/_sems bskyed cing sdom pa bzung nas/_da ni ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
[\[3b.2\]]dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa stong pa nyid la blo gtad la/_de sgrub par byed pa'i tshig 'di brjod de sgra'i don la mos par bya'o/_/rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/_/yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/_/yang dag mtha' la yi ge med/_/chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes/_/oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra
[\[3b.3\]]swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_zhes brjod pas phyi nang gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med par gyur te/_ye shes kyis sbyangs nas/_chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur rang gi sems kyi snang ba shar ba las A li dang /_kA li'i phreng ba bsams la/_A li las ni pad+ma dkar po'i steng /_kA li las
[\[3b.4\]]chos kyi 'byung gnas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/_de'i tha ma 'od zer gyi phreng ba lngas bskor ba'i nang du 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga 'phros shing 'dus pa las/_'od ljang gu las rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa/_'od dmar po las me'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa/_'od dkar po
[\[3b.5\]]las chu'i dkyil 'khor rin po ches mtshan pa/_'od ser po las gser gyi sa gzhi 'khor los mtshan pa/_'od sngon po las ri rab rdo rjes mtshan pa/_de yang shar shel/_lho baiDUR+Ya/_nub pad+ma rA ga_/byang gser rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga ka ril gyis 'dus pa las/_lha'i

[\[4a.1\]]dang /_'khor rnams kyang go rims su pad+ma dang /_zla ba'i gdan bkram par bsams la/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan thog tu rang gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las A li kA li'i phreng ba byung ba las/_de'i spro bsdu'i byin rlabs las zla ba dang nyi ma la de dang des mtshan par gyur/_de'i nang du

[\[4b.1\]]ba de rnams 'od zer dang bcas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi nas phar 'phros pas/_rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i zhing khams su sangs rgyas mchod nas/_slar 'od zer du 'dus te dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas tshur 'dus pa las/_gdan rnams kyis seng du yi ge a 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa de gnas pa las/_de
[\[4b.2\]]rnams las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'di lta ste/_shar phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_sa gnon gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstod pa/_g.yon dril
[\[4b.3\]]bu dku la gtad pa'o/_/g.yas ngos su rdo rje rgyal po mdog ser po tho ba thogs pa'o/_/rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa dmar po mda' 'gengs pa'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje legs pa ljang gu rdo rje 'dzin pa/_se gol gyis legs pa ster ba'o/_/lho phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la/_sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan

[\[4b.5\]]po rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po so shing gi phreng ba thogs pa'o/_/nub phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_mnyam gzhag gi thog na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/mdun du
[\[4b.6\]]rdo rje chos dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu snying gar kha bye ba 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yas su rdo rje rnon po sngon po ral gri thogs pa'o/_/rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu ser po 'khor lo can no/_/g.yon du rdo rje smra ba sngon po lce thogs pa'o/_/byang phyogs kyi gling gi ni ma la sangs rgyas don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
[\[4b.7\]]skyabs sbyin mdzad cing rgya gram can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/mdun du rdo rje las ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'o/_/g.yas su rdo rje srung ba ser po rdo rje'i khrab thogs pa'o/_/rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po mche ba thogs pa'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ser po rdo rje thogs

[\[5b.1\]]gnas pa'i tshul lo/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs bar snang la bsdus pa spyan drang bar bya ste/_oM a AHsarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/_ha ra ha ra/_oM hUM hrIH_b+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti bA gI shwa ra/_ma hA pA tsa sarba d+ha r+m+ma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/_d+ha r+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na

[\[5b.3\]]bzhi nas tshur spyan drangs la bgegs bskrad cing yid kyis sgo bcad la/_rdo rje'i go chas bsrung la lha so so la bstims te dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/_rigs kyi yum bzhi nam mkha' la bsdu bar bya'o/_/ye shes kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur te dbang rtags spyi bor mtshan pa bsgom
[\[5b.4\]]par bya'o/_/de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni shar du brtan par bsgoms la bdag nyid lus gnyis kyi tshul du bzung ste/_lha snam la gnas te rdzas mchod pa lnga phul la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de/_rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/_rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/

[\[6a.1\]]la bstod de/_mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/_/ces pa nas/_ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/_/ces pa'i bar gyis bstod pa'i rgyal po des bstod la/_/shes rab kyi 'khor lo la sems gtad pa'i yid kyis gsang sngags rgyal po 'di drug bzlas par bya'o/_
[\[6a.2\]]oM badzra tI kaSh+Na duH khats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyAn mUr+t+ta ye/_dz+nyA na kA ya/_wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/de ltar lha bskyed cing gsol ba btab la gnas pa de dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan
[\[6a.3\]]yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod la 'gro ba'i don du phrin las la sbyar te/_dkyil 'khor chen po drug 'jig rten du spro ste phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs bskyed nas nyon mongs pa drug sbyangs 'gro ba drug dbugs phyung dkyil 'khor drug gis 'gro
[\[6a.4\]]ba'i don mdzad nas slar snga ma nyid la bsdu zhing spros nas 'gro ba'i don bya'o/_/de tsam gyis ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de lta bu'i cho ga rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod de lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bshags nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu zhing chos thams cad stong
[\[6a.5\]]pa nyid du rgyas gdab cing bde ba'i spyod pa bya'o/_/de lta bu'i sbyor bas mtshan ma brtan po byung ba de srid kyi bar du bya ste/_de yang sems rtse gcig tu bsgom zhing zlos pa de la ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas chos kyi sgo thams cad ston
[\[6a.6\]]par mdzad de sku yang ston to zhes gsungs pas/_zhal mthong ba'am rmi lam du lung bstan pa la sogs pa ma byung gi bar du bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsnyen pa ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/_/de ltar bsnyen pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gnang ba thob nas gzhan gyi don du dkyil
[\[6a.7\]]'khor chen pa'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas/_ri dang chu klung dang nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su slob dpon la slob mas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i go skabs phye ste/_dang po sa'i cho gar yang de bzhin du mnyam pa yin

[\[6b.1\]]na dbus mtho byang shar gzhol te dma' ba/_sa gzhi 'jam pa nyams dga' ba'i gnas su ngam grog dang bya skyibs dang /_bong ba la sogs pa med pa 'jam zhing lhun stug pa der dkyil 'khor brtsig pa'am bri ba'i don du sa'i bdag po la gnang ba thob par byas la/_sa'i lha mo

[\[6b.3\]]te mnyam par me long gi ngos ltar byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas sa la gtugs te/_oM badzra me di nI badzrI b+ha ba ma hA badzra hUM/_zhes pas rdo rje'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab po/_/de'i phyogs kun kyang a ga ru nag po gtul zhing du bas bdug go/_/de ltar na lhag par gnas

[\[10b.1\]]gyis rigs lnga'i sdom pa rig pa'i dbang lnga'i rten du rung bar bya ba'i phyir phog la/_/gzhan yang mi dge ba bcu dang /_nye ba'i las kyang spang ba'i sdom pa sbyin no/_/des kyang slob dpon gyis sdom pa gsungs pa ltar/_kho bo yang bsrung zhing sdom par bgyid do zhes khas blangs la/_de dang

[\[10b.3\]]ldog 'khor lo sbyin par ldan/_/thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog_/dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur te/_/skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab cing /_/dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong

[\[45a.5\]]dbang ba la sogs te/_dbang bcu thob pas rgyal ba kun dang chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gcig pas gcig brnyes pa'o/_/gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos/_/zhes smos pa la phyag gi gnas ni dkon mchog gsum mo/_/chos nyid ni ma nor ba'i lam yin te/_
[\[45a.6\]]shes par bya ba yin la/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ni de shes par byed pa yin te/_shes pa dang shes bya khyad par med ces 'byung bas mnyam pa dang /_don dam par gnyis su med pas mnyam pa de la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa'i yid kyis dang pa'i dad pa dang /_
[\[45a.7\]]don ji lta ba bzhin du nges par bzung ba'i mos pas phyag 'tshal ba yin no/_/don gnyis pa ston te/_ci'i phyir/_rtogs par bya zhe na/_phan yon che ba'i phyir te/_phan yon yang rnam pa gsum ste/_rgyur gnas pa'i phan yon dang /_mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]khyad par gyi phan yon dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi gzhi lam gyi mchog tu bstan pa'o/_/de la rgyur gnas pa'i phan yon ni/_ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags la/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i ston pa 'jig rten phyi nang gi
[\[45b.2\]]mun pa sel ba'i ye shes kyi sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis kyang 'dra zhing mtshungs par byang chub kyi sems la phan yon che bar bsngags te/_ji skad du bsngags she na/_chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i snying po 'di/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /_
[\[45b.3\]]chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni ye nas gnas pa'i chos kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni/_'jam dpal gzhon nu zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir 'jam zhe na/_zug rngu med pa'i phyir 'jam pa dang /_de rtogs na sems can kun gyi dpal du gyur pa dang /_gzhom pa ni gtsang ba'i don te/_skyon dang dri mas ma
[\[45b.4\]]gos pa'i phyir ro/_/snying po gong du bstan pa nyid chos rnams kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal zhes bya ba/_byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid ma nor bar rtogs pa ni/_sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir/_/bder gshegs ma lus yum du gyur
[\[45b.5\]]pa rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go/_/zhes smos te/_lam 'di ma rtogs par lam gzhan gyis 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa/_/tshul khrims la sogs te pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang byang
[\[45b.6\]]chub kyi sems kyis ma zin na/_sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i tshogs su mi 'grub pas/_sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad kyi gzhi yin par yang ston to/_/mngon du gyur te 'bras bu'i dus na yang khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa ni/_rnam dag byang chub sems kyi
[\[45b.7\]]ngang tshul bsgom dang yon tan khyad par ni/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/_spro ba rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin nam/_ngang tshul ma nor bar bsgoms te/_mngon du gyur pa'i tshe/_yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bu dag thob ce na blo dang ldan na nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na/_
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur pa chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems mngon du gyur pa de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs te/_sku gsum gyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa chos kyi sku zhes byang chub kyi sems de la bya ste/_byang chub kyi
[\[46a.2\]]sems de la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad kyi gzhi ni chos kyi sku yin pas mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/shes byed dam par gyur pas shes rab spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya/_/shes bya thams cad shes par byed pa'i nang na/_dam pa ni shes rab kyi spyan yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes bya kun
[\[46a.3\]]gyi nang na chos thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'i chos nyid ni dam pa yin pas/_de rtogs pa'i shes byed kyang dam pa zhes bya ste/_sha'i spyan dang lha'i spyan la sogs te/_spyan lnga'i nang na yang byang chub kyi sems mngon du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi spyan ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/rdo rje rtse

[\[46a.7\]]byang chub kyi sems rdzogs shing mthar phyin par rtogs pa las yon tan rdzogs par 'byung la/_byang chub kyi sems 'bring dang /_chung ngu rtogs na yang /_yon tan de yang de bzhin du byung zhing thob la/_byang chub kyi sems ma rtogs pa rnams la ni/_grol ba thar pa chung ngu tsam yang mi thob ste/_
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]de bas na 'di ni grol ba thar ba thams cad kyi gzhi yang yin/_'bras bu mchog grub pa'i lam yin pas thar pa'i lam gyi nang na yang mchog yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_/nyan thos la sogs 'phags pa'i
[\[46b.2\]]rigs kun gyi nang na/_'bras bu che ba'i phyir/_theg pa chen po ni rigs chen zhes bya ste/_bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po la sems pas/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_de dag thams cad kyang de med na mi 'byung /_/de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do/_/byang chub kyi sems de ni de
[\[46b.3\]]med na byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi 'byung bas/_de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems de ni/_rnam par grol ba'i lam kun gyi nang na mchog yin no/_/don gsum pa ston te/_ci zhig rtogs par bya zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems so/_/de yang bsam pa dang brjod pa las 'das pas brtags pa'i
[\[46b.4\]]yul ma yin par bstan te/_des na kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur/_/gong du bstan pa de ltar phan yon che na/_dus dang gnas kun du cis kyang mi shigs la/_de rtogs na sgrib pa'i dra ba gcod pas rdo rje ste/_sems kyi chos nyid ma nor bar rig pa la rdo rje sems
[\[46b.5\]]dpa' zhes kyang bya/_byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya ba ste/_sems kyi mtshan nyid ma rig pa'i bla thabs kyi sgo nas/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad du snang la/_sems kyi rang bzhin ma nor ba'i rdo rje la sems pa de'i tshe/_rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
[\[46b.6\]]pa rnams su yang snang bas/_bsgom par bya gang gis ma nor bsgom par 'gyur/_zhes dris pa'i lan du/_phra shing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/_/blo rtsing zhing shes rab zhen pas mi rtog pas phra zhing shes par dka' ste/_bdag dang gzhan dang
[\[46b.7\]]po'i lam du 'jug cing zhugs pa'i drang srong chen po sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di ni rtog pa'i yul yang ma yin la/_/mi rtog pa'i yum yang ma yin pas/_rtog pa dang mi rtog pa las 'das pa ste/_de'i phyir brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral te/_

[\[47a.1\]]sems kyis brtag par dka' zhing tshig gis bstan par yang dka' la/_tshig gis don yang ston/_tshig de don ma yin pas brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba'i phyir tshig gis mi phebs/_gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang /_/don ni tha snyad
[\[47a.2\]]las 'das pa yin pas/_tshig gis mi phebs shing theg pa chen po las gzhan pa nyan thos la sogs pa dang /_so so'i skye bo byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin yang shes shing rtogs par bya ba'i thabs ni yod do/_/don bzhi pa ston te/_de ltar rtogs par bya ba'i thabs yod na gang gis

[\[47a.5\]]mngon sum la sogs rgyu yis dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa/_/mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rgyus kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i dngos po rnams la 'jig cing spyod de tha mar yod pa zhig du grub bam/_med pa zhig tu grub

[\[47a.7\]]nas/_log pa'i blo yis 'jig cing spyod de/_dper na thag pa la sbrul du mthong ba'i tshe/_bdag gis mngon sum du mthong bas ci'i phyir sbrul med ces rang gi 'khrul pa mngon sum tshad mar bzung ba ni tshad mar mi rung ba dang 'dra'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]mtha' med de snying po med na tshad ma gang /_/rtag pa'i sems nyid yang dag pa'i mthar na ji lta bur yang ma grub pa'i phyir/_des spyod pa lta ga la yod pas dpyod mtha' med de snying por bya ba ci yang med na tshad mar gang gzhag_/de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir

[\[47b.3\]]mi dgos so/_/don rnam pa lnga dngos po gang brtags te rtogs par bya zhe na/_rnam pa gnyis te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i dngos po la brtag par bya'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa brtag pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid yin par

[\[47b.7\]]nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni/_sems can rnams kyi sems kyis rig cing yul du snang ba'i nang gi dbang po drug dang /_phyi'i yul drug yod par grags pa'i chos 'di ni/_'dzin pa drug gis ji ltar mthong zhing brtag pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul/_/'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa

[\[48a.1\]]drug gis mthong zhing thos pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i yul du brtag pa ste/_ci snang ba rnams de bzhin yod pa ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro/_/rang gi rtog pas myos pa'i de bzhin bzung ba bden 'gyur na/_/ma rig pa'i rtog pas myos pa'i log par mthong ba rnams/_
[\[48a.2\]]de bzhin bden par gyur na ni/_de dag dngos po mi rtog dgra bcom 'dra bar grol bar 'gyur ba'i rigs/_/skye bo de dang dgra bcom gnyi gas kyang /_/bden pa mthong bar bye brag med pas/_gnyi gas kyang 'dra bar rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs na/_
[\[48a.3\]]de dag dus dgras 'joms shing sdug bsngal nyen las de 'khrul mngon par 'gyur/_/sems can de dag ni na ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pa dus kyi dgras 'joms shing sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis nyen pa des na/_sems can gyis mthong ba rnams ni 'khrul pa yin par mngon no/_/gzhan
[\[48a.4\]]du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni/_'khrul pas las gzhan du 'gal te/_gal te ma 'khrul te sems can gyi skye mched bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad ma yin na ni/_de nyid tshad mar gyur par 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la
[\[48a.5\]]'phags pa'i lam rang chas su yod pa'i phyir ro/_/lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te/_/sems can 'khrul pas mthong ba rnam par grol ba'i lam du 'dod pa/_dbang po bems po la brten pa'i shes pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las mi thar te/_de ci'i
[\[48a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_sems can gyi mtshan ma sna tshogs su mthong ba'i shes pas ni/_sdug bsngal 'gag yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs skye ba'i gnas/_/sdug bsngal spong ba'i lta ga la yod kyi sdug bsngal skye ba'i gnas yin pas/_de'i phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhing
[\[48a.7\]]rgyal bas gsungs/_de ltar sems can gyis mthong ba rnams ni rig pas kyang 'khrul par mngon zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi lung las kyang 'khrul pa yin par gsungs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa brtag pa la yang rnam pa gnyis su phye ba las/_gnyis pa 'khrul pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rnam pa dgus bstan te/_gang snang ba dang ci phyir snang ba dang /_snang ba'i nyes pa dang snang ba'i gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa dang /_tshul ji ltar snang ba dang /_snang ba'i sems kyi nang du thams cad 'dus pas thob par bya ba med pa dang /_thams cad sems kyi mtshan
[\[48b.2\]]nyid yin na rgyu rkyen gzhan las ci'i phyir skye bar snang bar 'gyur zhes dris pa'i lan dang /_snang ba'i dngos po ma grub pa dang /_snang ba'i gzhi sems nyid kyang ma grub par bstan pa rnams so/_/de la gang snang zhe na/_'khrul pa'i dbang gis sems nyid rnam pa sna tshogs su snang bar ston te/_
[\[48b.3\]]de na de la 'khrul pa'i dbang gis 'di dag ji ltar snang bar 'gyur/_/'khrul pa yin par mngon pa des na/_sems can de dag la 'khrul pa'i dbang gis 'di dag ci ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na/_kun du rtog can yang dag ma yin kun du rtog pas rtsom med nyams/_/sems can
[\[48b.4\]]gyi sems ni rang bzhin gyis kun du rtog pa can yin la/_gang du rtog ce na yang ba ma yin pa'i log pa'i rnam par kun du rtog pas/_thog ma'i rtsol ba med pa nas bden pa mthong ba las nyams shing /_blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas/_/yang dag pa'i
[\[48b.5\]]don ma mthong bas/_blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing /_bden pa mthong ba'i stobs dang mi ldan pas/_ma rig pa'i dbang du song ba'i phyir/_sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin/_/sems ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las sems las byung ba ni 'du byed lnga
[\[48b.6\]]bcu rtsa gcig yin te/_rang gi sems dag nyid 'og nas 'byung ba'i lus gsum gyi don ltar snang ba yin no/_/'du byed sna tshogs dag gi bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu brtas tshe/_/dge sdig gi las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyi bag chags bsags pa goms pas/_snga ma'i bag
[\[48b.7\]]chags smin cing brtas te/_'bras bu 'byin pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i tshe/_/sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang /_/rang gi sems nyid phyi'i yul dang /_nang gi lus 'dra bar snang ba ni/_dper na mi gtsang ba bsgoms pas/_sa yul thams cad rus pas gang
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]bar bsgom pa yun ring du bsgoms te/_mthu brtas pa'i tshe/_sa yul thams cad rus pas gang ba bzhin du/_rang gi sems nyid rus par snang ste/_lus gsum las de yan chad dang po bstan to/_/gnyis pa ni bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i
[\[49a.2\]]bdag med kun gzhi bag chags dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma'i rgyun la bdag yin no snyam pa'i dmigs pa skyes pa yid las ma gtogs pas bdag go snyam pa'i nan gyis brtags pa'i bdag ni med do/_/dper na thag pa khra bo la sbrul lo snyam pa'i rtog pa skyes kyang /_sbrul lo snyam pa'i rtog pa
[\[49a.3\]]tsam las ma gtogs par sbrul gyi mtshan nyid thag pa la med pa dang 'dra/_lus gsum pa ni/_'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las ma rig skye/_/'du byed kyi chos rags par snang bas/_kun gzhi phra ba bsgribs te/_ma mthong ba de las shes pa dang rig pa skye bas 'dra bar
[\[49a.4\]]snang ste/_dper na smig rgyu yin par ma shes pa las chu'i rtog pa skye ba dang 'dra/_dgur phye ba las gnyis pa ci'i phyir snang zhe na/_kun gzhi mtshan nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir te/_dpe thag pa'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba las/_sbrul du 'khrul pa 'byung ba dang 'dra bar/_
[\[49a.5\]]rgyu dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/kun gzhi bag chags dang bcas pa'i mthu las rnam pa sna tshogs su snang bar ni ma rtogs pas/_snang ba thams cad rang gi ngo bor yod pas phyin ci log tu rtog pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas/_de las zag bcas
[\[49a.6\]]rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed/_/log pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa de las khams gsum du zag cing 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i rtog pas bla thabs su brtags pa'i bdag dang /_phyi nang gi chos su log pa'i rtog pas rgyas par byed/_ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra ba rgyu ba
[\[49a.7\]]de ni ma mthong las/_/bdag tu lta ba la sogs mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar bar rtogs/_/kun gzhi'i phreng ba ma mthong ba las mu stegs kyi lta ba sna tshogs mang po 'byung bar yang ston te/_ci'i phyir 'byung zhe na/_sems 'di las rnam pa mtha' yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]pa med/_sems zhes bya ba kun gzhi ni dge sdig gi las kyi bag chags mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pas/_kun gzhi la bag chags gnas pa yang mtha' med pas/_bag chags 'di dag mi gnas zhes nges par bzung du ni med do/_/bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang
[\[49b.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/kun gzhi la bag chags gnas pa/_dge ba'i rkyen gyis ni mtho ris su skye ba'i bag chags sad par byed la/_nyon mongs shing mi dge ba'i rkyen gyis ni/_/ngan song du skye ba'i bag chags sad par byed pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i yang sna tshogs te/_rkyen 'ga' bag chags

[\[54a.5\]]gzung ba'i snang ba med pa ni dbu ma'i lam yin te/_don de la de lta bu'i tshul du sems pas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'grub pas byang chub kyi sems zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs so/_/bcu gnyis su bstan pa las/_don bdun pa nges pa'i don la bsgom pa yang rnam pa gnyis

[\[54b.1\]]stong pa nyid yin la/_mtshan ma nyid mtshan ma med pa/_smon pa nyid smon pa yin pas spong du med pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las nyid do/_/de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin btsal spangs gar mi gnas/_/'khor ba 'grub par byed pa ni

[\[55a.6\]]'dzin cing shes pa skyes pas rnam pa'i shes pa yin pas rnam par shes pa la bya ste/_yang dag pa'i don bsgom pa ni ji lta bu'i rnam pa la yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam bral zhes bya'o/_/de ltar rnam pa ci lta bur yang mi 'dzin pa la ni/_mchog dang tha mar yang mi dmigs pas de ltar bsgoms pa ni lam gyi mchog

[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing bsgom pa'i rgyu'am gnas yin te/_ting nge 'dzin gsum po brtan por byas shing rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/_bya ba med pa'i don nyid la ma bab cing /_rtse gcig tu rnam par mi rtog pas bsgom pa dang /_kun tu

[\[57a.1\]]dpa' ste/_log par mthong ba'i sems nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams su snang la/_ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i sems nyid ni rnam par grol ba rnams su yang snang ba'i phyir/_lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin zhes bstan pa yin no/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod

[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]gsum po bla mar bcas pa yi/_/mchod gnas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/_/yon tan thams cad skye ba'i gnas byang chub kyi sems 'di bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can ji snyed pa'i gtso bo'am/_/bla ma brgya byin tshangs par bcas

[\[57b.5\]]dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang bsrungs pa yin/_/tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags/_/gong du bstan pa yin te legs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi nang du ma 'dus pa med par bstan

[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]de yang skye phyis kyang skye bar 'gyur te/_skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pas skye ba'i dbang du song ba'o/_/rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa/_sems kyi rtog pa 'di nyid kyis nga dag pa'i mtha' mi shes pas log

[\[58a.3\]]dag gis sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams/_rmi lam gyis bslus bzhin du rmi ba'i bde ba nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song bar rmi lam 'dra/_zhes smos pa yin no/_/lam 'di spong zhing lam gzhan du bltas pas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de/_de dag rdo la gser bzhin
[\[58a.4\]]thugs rje'i thugs rjes kyi ma'o 'phrogs pa yin/_gong du ji skad bstan pa'i lam 'di spong zhing theg pa chen po'i lam ji lta ba bzhin ma lcogs te/_mthar ltung ba'i skyon dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam las gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ba sna tshogs kyis lam du bltas pas ma nor ba'i zhes ston pa de ni
[\[58a.5\]]dper na rdo las gser zhes zer ba dang 'dra ste/_thugs rjer rung zhing 'phags pa thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi thugs rjes rang dbang med par gdung ba skye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dper na yid du 'ong ba'i yul la sems yengs te/_'jug pa la rang dbang med pa las/_yul gyis

[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]'dzin gyi/_don gyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin dpyod par mi byed de/_don ni mun khung na gser 'dug pa dang 'di/_tshig ni sgron ma dang mtshungs te/_tshig gi sgron mas don gyi gser btsal ba yin gyis kyang /_ji ltar sgron ma de gser ma yin pa bzhin du tshig ni don ma yin par shes te/_tshig la don gyi ngo bor gzung

[\[75a.1\]]pa'o/_/de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la mu khyud bzhi lte ba dang bcas par bsgom mo/_/rtsibs dkar po bcu la/_oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+t+tA ya te na maH/_zhes pa rim par dgod do/_/gzhan ma gong ma dang mthun no/_/dbus kyi lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi

[\[75b.1\]]dpa' sdug bsngal gcod pa zhes bya ba sku mdog sngon po rgyan gong dang 'dra ba/_phyag g.yas ral gri/_g.yon rdo rje bsnams pa/_thugs kar zla ba la hUM sngon po bsgom mo/_/de las 'od zer rim par phyir 'phros pas mi bskyod pa khro bo'i rigs kyi 'od 'phros te/_sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang dag par

[\[158b.1\]]rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/_phyag gnyis yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje bzhad pa ni sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar ba/_so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa bsnams pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje chos

[\[158b.6\]]'dra'o/_/sems ma bcu drug ni kun du bzang mo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang /_dga' la chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje rigs kyi'o/_/rin po che'i gtso mo dang /_rat+na'i sgrol ma dang /_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan dang /_bkod pa dang ldan ma dang bzhi ni rat+na'i rigs kyi'o/_/rdo rje

[\[159a.1\]]'di'i lugs kyis spyan ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor/_mA ma kI la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor/_gzhan gnyis po yang rigs mthun pas bskor ba'o/_/'dir rdo rje thig gi nang logs su ri mo zur bzhi pa byas pa'i brgyad cha'i sgo ste rta

[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]sa ni nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_mi g.yo ba'i sa ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/_phyag g.yon pa bsnyems pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje lnga pa mdog dmar po ste/_pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin pa'o/_/

[\[159b.3\]]gung gi mdog can phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bsnams pa'o/_/lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_rgyan sna tshogs 'chang
[\[159b.4\]]ba/_gzhon zhing dar la bab pa zhal gyi pad+ma sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'i gser gyi gdu bus lag ngar bkang ba/_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_rtse bran mnga' ba/_/phyag g.yas pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid
[\[159b.5\]]bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pad+ma dmar po ltar sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku
[\[159b.6\]]mdog dmar skya/_/phyag g.yon pas 'bru dang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon pas a shwa ka'i me tog gi mgo lcogs 'dab ma dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag
[\[159b.7\]]g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa markata kyi mdog can/_phyag g.yon pas ut+pal bsnams pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/_/phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/_/thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pri yang ku ltar sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar
[\[160a.2\]]po'i steng du rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_/smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/_/stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/_/ye shes
[\[160a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/_/nub phyogs su dbang bcu pad+ma dang
[\[160a.4\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa mnga' ba/_gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/_sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/_zhal gyi pad+ma cung zad 'dzum pa dang /_spyan ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/_'od mtha' yas pa'i rin po
[\[160a.5\]]che'i dbu rgyan can/_phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa/_g.yon na bsnyems pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya/_/de la tshe la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/_phyag g.yon na pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'dab ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa ting nge 'dzin
[\[160a.6\]]la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sku bsnams pa'o/_/sems la dbang ba zla ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis me tog ban+du ka ltar dmar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/_/yo byad la dbang ba sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/las la
[\[160a.7\]]dbang ba markata lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_/skye ba la dbang ba sku mdog sna tshogs pa/_phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa dzA ti'i yal ga bsnams pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]'khor bsnams pa'o/_/mos pa la dbang ba pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar mdog dkar ba/_phyag g.yon na me tog pri yang ku'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/_/smon lam la dbang ba gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa'o/_/ye shes la dbang ba mthon ka chen po'i mdog can/_/phyag g.yon na ut+pa la sngon
[\[160b.2\]]po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/_/chos la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/_phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du bum pa bzang po bsnams pa'o/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i tshon shel gyi mdog can/_phyag g.yas na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/_/phyag g.yon na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o/_/sangs
[\[160b.3\]]rgyas kyi byang chub gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas na pad+ma ser po'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/_/'di gnyis kyi gdan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i dbang rnams dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs
[\[160b.4\]]su gzugs bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi rtse bran can/_phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon gyis dkur brten pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim
[\[160b.5\]]bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/de la nor ldan gyi gzungs ni gser gyi mdog can/_phyag g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o/_/rin chen sgrol ma'i gzungs ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/_phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs ni sku mdog

[\[204a.2\]]bar bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/_/dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no/_/byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/_/phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o/_/gang 'di skyes pa tsam gyis su/_/sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med/_/dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing /_/
[\[204a.3\]]nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o/_/mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis/_/tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/_/bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/_/dka' thub can gyis ma gdungs shig_/ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung /_/'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag
[\[204a.4\]]rgya rnams/_/nam yang yongs su mi gtong zhing /_/slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/_/sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/_/slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas smad pas na/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/_/rims dang
[\[204a.5\]]dug dang dbyig dug nang /_/mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso bo dang /_/gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/_/bsad nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur/_/de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/_/dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/_/nam yang smad
[\[204a.6\]]par mi bya'o/_/bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/_/rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/_/des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/_/phyir zhing dbyung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/_/sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang /_/rang srog gis rtag bstan bya na/_/longs spyod g.yo
[\[204a.7\]]bas smos ci dgos/_/gang phyir bskal ba bye ba ni/_/grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/_/tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/_/rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/_/rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/_/de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/deng khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te/_/gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na/_/dam
[\[204b.2\]]tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam/_/rang byung du yang der skyes so/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/_/kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/_/khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/_/rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/_/deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/_/grong khyer mchog tu
[\[204b.3\]]rab tu zhugs/_/khyed rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/deng nyid thob par the tshom med/_/aHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba phul du byung ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_dpal rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma
[\[204b.4\]]mchog rnams la/_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig_/mchog tu rtag pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/de la gtan tshig ci yod ce na/_gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de bzhin gshegs
[\[204b.5\]]pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis/_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin la/_phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na/_nges pa'i phung po la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[204b.6\]]yin la/_dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na/_de ltar byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ste/_rdo rje
[\[204b.7\]]sems dpar bdag sbyor zhing /_/thams cad sbyor ba rjes sbyar ldan/_/sangs rgyas nyid du shes bya ste/_/sangs rgyas dam pa rtag pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod kyi bdag nyid thams cad du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/rang gi dam

[\[205a.1\]]tshig yongs su gzung ba ni don yod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mngon par rtogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i

[\[205a.4\]]yang dag par gso bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rig par sbyar bar bya'o/_/gang gis na khyod pha rol mu stegs kyi gzhung gis log pa'i lta ba can du mi 'gyur zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad du ltung ba la
[\[205a.5\]]sogs pa dang /_lus 'di shin tu yang mi smra ba nyid dang /_sems shin tu yang 'gog par mi 'gyur bar gang gis sku gsung thugs rdo rje thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gis bla na med pa'i dngos grub
[\[205a.6\]]mchog tu rtag par 'gyur bar yang gyis shig_/yang smras pa/_'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang /_/cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/_/sdig pa med kyis mi 'jigs shig_/dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas

[\[243b.3\]]pa brtsegs pa ni mtha' yas shing sna tshogs pa'i chos rnams rab tu snang ba'o/_/mthu chen thob ni mi snang ba'i stobs chen po thams cad thob pa'o/_/ngan song thams cad spong ba ni ngan song gsum po ma lus par rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms
